description.english: Successfully escaped 100 times in Quick Match without being captured even once while playing as an animal

description.german: Als Tier im Schnellspiel 100-mal entkommen, ohne auch nur ein einziges Mal gefangen zu werden
description.italian: Gioca come animale in Partita rapida e riesci a fuggire 100 volte senza essere catturato nemmeno una volta
